title: Teaching
text:
Applied Econometrics (Econ 8208, PhD)
A first year PhD course in structural econometrics.

title: Teaching
text:
Wages and Employment (Econ 8502, PhD)
Despite the name, a second year PhD course covering methods in structural econometrics, with an emphasis on identification and estimation of dynamic structural models.

title: About
text: I’m an Assistant Professor of Economics at the University of Minnesota. Find my research here and my CV here. I teach three classes periodically.
